turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey! I need a favor, can you order online a two pizzas for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Absolutely. What's the pizzas for?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: My friend's son is turning 12 and he is obsessed with pizza so I wanted to surprise him.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That's so sweet. He's going to love it. Does he have a favorite pizza joint?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: He loves Papa Johns so place the order from them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You got it. What kind of pizzas do you want me to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One Large Pepperoni for sure. This kid eats pepperoni on his sandwiches, it's wild.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That's really funny. Okay, so one medium pepperoni and what about the other?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, the pepperoni is a large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Whoops, sorry I need to clean my ears out.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No worries. The second pizza is going to be a medium veggie.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What types of veggies do you want on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I believe he hates mushrooms so make sure no mushrooms are on anything.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will make sure. That would ruin his birthday for sure.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It really would. Lets make the veggie pizza have onions, peppers and banana peppers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Are you sure you want banana peppers? I don't know many kids who like banana peppers.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You're right. No banana peppers. Peppers and Onions. Lets keep it simple.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I think that will be more crowd pleasing and most kids like both onions and peppers.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I agree. Lets get a medium cheese too. I want to make sure there is enough for everyone. Go place the order for a 5pm pick up. Also, add two sides of garlic knots. I love those.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, just to confirm I'm order one large pepperoni, one medium peppers and onions and one medium cheese and 2 sides of garlic knots?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep! That sounds great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The order is complete and will be ready for pickup in 25 minutes. Everyone is going to love you once you bring this to the party!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks a bunch! I sure hope so!!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The receipt is being sent to your mobile via text message just in case they need the order number when you pick it up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Got it.
